storyInfo: Chiave discovers that Broca seems to be distracted lately, shutting himself in his room. He sneaks into Broca's room out of concern, but...

attributes.content: ...Anything interesting going on, Aosta?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait, no, Aosta's out in the field.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm bored. Why won't anything interesting happen?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Got any ideas, Broca?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hm.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: ...What day of the week is it again?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Tuesday.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I'm done. Heading back.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It's Wednesday, though. Something's going on with him.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: He's hiding something from me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Now THAT is something interesting.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I should see what he's up to—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: No, he wouldn't tell me if I asked. What I should do is—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: There.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Broca's room is not particularly tidy for an operator.
Not that it is exceptionally messy, but it is filled with things. Parts, plans, and tools are scattered over the floor, on the desk, and even on the bed.
It is more workshop than dorm room.
Most prominent is the workbench in a corner.
Broca had earned recognition for his skills after joining Rhodes Island, and the Engineering Department had prepared a work area for him in its workshop.
But he turned the offer down, preferring to work in his own room.
So the Engineering Department instead provided him with a workbench and soundproofed his room.
Normally, Broca gets straight to work after returning to his room.
But he does not do so today, instead sitting on his chair and taking a look around the desk.
Numerous designs have been placed around the desk, all depicting his multi-function drill.
It's so hard to give up on any of these designs—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: But I just got some new ideas today. I should make a few more versions.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Alright, let's get to work—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Operator Broca, please report to the Engineering Department immediately.
attributes.name: Communications Announcement

attributes.content: The Engineering Department? Did they finally get those materials I asked for?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I should go check.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Bravo, got him out of the way.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If Aosta were here, he'd shake his head over how simple-minded the guy is.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But I don't think being simple is so bad.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Alright, now, let's see what he was up to behind my back.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Huh? What's with these designs—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Ooh, this drill can be extended. Nice.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But I think I prefer the one with built-in speakers that can play heavy metal.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Mamma mia! This one's a masterpiece! It transforms from a drill to a chainsaw! Just like in that video game we played together!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I knew it...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It was you!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Welcome back, Broca.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Stop looking at them!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: These plans aren't half bad.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Very creative.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And here I thought you were hiding in here 'cause you were up to something shady.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I wasn't trying to hide them. It's just that I had a lot of ideas...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: This drill's been with me since I was in Siracusa. It's like another arm for me.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I just wanted to tinker with it a little.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: So why hide it? Isn't your bro just like your arm either?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You don't use your bros to hold it steady when you take a leak.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hey, I'm open to that too, just saying.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Seriously, I've thought this through. Once we're real old, we could—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Vaffanculo.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What I'm saying is that these are all just whatever dumb ideas came to mind!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I never planned on showing them to anyone!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Does it matter?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Of course it does!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Didn't we swear to keep no secrets between us?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's not the same thing! If I wanted to show them to you, I would!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, I already saw them.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And since I have, why not let me help you mod your drill? Aosta's not around and I am SO bored.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Vai a cagare!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hey, open the door, Broca!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What's the big deal?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I don't get it. Why even hide it? It's just a drill.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Well, I'm not taking no for an answer. Just you wait, Broca!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Okay, back to work.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Damn Chiave, that cretino.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: How am I supposed to focus on the design now?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That completely killed my mood.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Dammit.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Guess I'll go for a walk. Maybe that'll give me some inspiration.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Whenever Broca has trouble focusing, he comes to the Convalescent Garden that Perfumer tends to.
The pleasant aroma surrounds him the moment he steps in.
He finds a corner to sit down, and then begins to take in the sweet air.
He takes a few breaths, and feels his mind calm down.
What if, when the drill's spinning—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Let's make it give off a sweet scent!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: What are you doing here?!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I saw you come this way, so I followed you.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But I bet you were thinking the same thing, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: No, I wasn't.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: But you were talking about the drill, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You heard wrong.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Yeah right. Besides, we're bros. I know you. We were definitely thinking the same thing!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Even if we were, we definitely aren't now!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Why not?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Because you said it first.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What? C'mon bro, since when were you so picky? It's not like this is the first time we've modded something together.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's not the same, bro.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: This time, I chose to mod it on my own. It's not the same.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, what's the difference then?!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: The wind is strong on the deck. There are a few operators standing in the distance, but it would be fair to describe this place as 'empty'.
Broca is among those who like to come here at this hour.
He enjoys the emptiness, the solitude.
Of course, he also has another aim today.
He took a dozen different passages, made eight wrong turns, and spent time in six activity rooms before arriving here.
...I hope Chiave doesn't show up this time.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Broca stands by the handrails, letting his mind go blank, feeling the wind rip through his hair.
He resolves to think about nothing until dinner.
By then, Chiave should hopefully have given up.
But things rarely go as planned.
A hand taps him on the shoulder.
Why, Chiave?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Chiave is standing behind him, holding several designs in his hand.
I've been thinking, bro. You made so many designs, so I should show you some of mine.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's why I drew a couple just now. Wanna take a look?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's not what I need, bro.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Then what do you need?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nothing. I need nothing from you. I just wanna mod this drill on my own, maybe get creative with it.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's the part I don't get. Why do you have to do it on your own?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Because—tch, how do I explain it to you?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Just say it. I won't laugh.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: That's not the problem.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: There are just some things I can't say out loud.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, how am I supposed to know if you don't tell me?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'd have thrown you off the deck by now if we weren't bros.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Fine... It's 'cause Ithink think the designs are is nothing special. Like a kid's doodles.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I'm just messing around. It was never meant for anyone else.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: And now you know.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: So that's what this was about.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I knew you lacked confidence, bro, so I guess it's not too surprising.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But you've been at Rhodes Island for a while now, and everybody here knows what you can do.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Be confident.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...That's not really it, but thanks anyway. Don't often get to hear you say something nice like that.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I wasn't done.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Besides, I think your ideas are great!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Which is why I've made up my mind—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'll show your designs to the folks in Engineering. Getting their approval would be a huge for you, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait, that's not...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hold it right there, Chiave! I'll skin you alive!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Damn, I'm too late.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: The plans on the workbench had disappeared.
I'm gonna request a new lock first thing in the morning, and I'll never give Chiave a spare keycard again!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Where'd he go—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Oh, right, of course, Engineering! Gotta keep my cool.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Phew—that was a long mission.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Finally, time to relax—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta! You're back!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Chiave's making a presentation in the Engineering Department. He's telling everyone to stop by.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Vulcan.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nothing good ever happens when you show up.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Hah! I brought lots of interesting designs today.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Look at these—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Thank goodness, made it in time.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: C'mon, Broca, don't be so shy.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's not what you think—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Stop pretending, I know exactly what you're thinking.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Merda, the hell you do—
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Everyone's gonna see your designs today!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Absolutely not!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Er, what happened?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta! You're back!
attributes.name: Chiave & Broca

attributes.content: I came because I heard Chiave was giving some kind of presentation.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So why does it look like you two are about to start punching each other?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Listen, Broca/Chiave is—
attributes.name: Chiave & Broca

attributes.content: Alright, I see what's going on.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You be the judge, Aosta. Who's in the right here?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'll hear you out first, Broca. What do you want here?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Chiave.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I finally get it.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: The only way out of this mess is to beat you up so bad you're stuck in bed for three days.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hmph, getting cocky now, are we?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You forced my hand.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You do know what you're saying, don't you?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm dead serious.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: ...Alright then, bring it on!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Cazzo!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I didn't do anything to piss Broca off recently, did I?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Does he not want to be bros with us anymore?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're overthinking it.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Well, there are a lot of interesting folks on Rhodes Island. If he wants to go solo, I guess I should give him my blessing.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's not like that.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: But—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: We've come all the way from Siracusa together. I can't let the team fall apart that easily.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: If he's getting any ideas, he's got to beat me first.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: And I'll give it my all to stop him!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Right, Aosta? Why are you giving me that look?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I'm just thinking that nothing's changed with either you or Broca after all these years.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: That so?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Yeah. Lasagna's on the lunch menu. You wanna fill up?
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: I'll get a few more drinks.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Hell yeah! Can't beat a bro up on an empty stomach!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You've eaten, haven't you? I'm not pulling any punches today.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Neither am I.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: There's still time to back out of this.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: No. We're doing this, Chiave.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Because you'd never give up on 'helping' me if we don't, would you?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Of course not! You and Aosta are my bros. I can't just leave you alone.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're saying you don't need my help? You don't need your bros anymore?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...You and Aosta are still my bros for sure.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Then let us help you!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Er, could you keep me out of this?
attributes.name: Aosta (In the Distance)

attributes.content: Us being bros has nothing to do with it!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I'm allowed to want to solve my own problems!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You stubborn cretino!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're the stubborn one!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Looks like my fist and my spanner will have to remind you that the Chiave Gang is inseparable!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Then my fist and my drill will have to tell you that even bros need some personal space!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, I never needed any, you stronzo!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But I do!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: What the... my stomach—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: My stomach... it hurts...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Aosta... you set me up—
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Sorry, Chiave.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Aosta, is he still angry?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Of course he is, after what you said.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: He even asked me if he pissed you off recently.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: ...*sigh*
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I know he honestly wants to help me.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's just the kind of guy he is. Everything he has, he wants to share with the people around him. He doesn't understand that some people need their own alone time.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: He wouldn't be Chiave if he listened.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Which is why I need your help.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: In a corner of the Engineering Department, Chiave lies feebly on a bench, gazing up at the ceiling while holding his stomach, giving the impression that he has never been so bewildered.
Aosta sits by him with a bag in his hands.
Broca got you some medicine from Medical. Take it and you should feel better tomorrow.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Dammit.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I still don't get it.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Shouldn't bros share everything with each other, no matter what?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Bros, lovers, family... Even in relationships like that, people keep secrets from each other.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Sometimes, we even keep secrets from ourselves.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: You might be the only person on Terra who'd ask a question like that.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: So you're keeping things from me too?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Then what do I do? Do I just have to accept it?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Maybe—
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: In the distance, Broca is standing at the door to an Engineering workshop, ready to go.
He takes one concerned glance towards Aosta and Chiave. Aosta nods to reassure him.
Broca lets out a sigh of relief, then brings his drill into the workshop along with the materials he prepared.
But maybe sometimes all we have to do is to wait.
attributes.name: Aosta

attributes.content: Then, we greet our bro with a smile.
attributes.name: Aosta
